edu.uci.isr.impromptu.common
Class PeerManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.impromptu.common.PeerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.jmdns.ServiceListener, javax.jmdns.ServiceTypeListener
public class PeerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.jmdns.ServiceListener, javax.jmdns.ServiceTypeListener

RepositoryPeer Manager uses JmDNS to manage present peers for a peer owner. The rationale is to reuse this in both the pie and the repository.

Author:
Jie Ren

Returns:

getOwnerPeer

public Peer getOwnerPeer(java.lang.String filename)
Get owner of a file. If the file is owned by any peer, the owing peer would be returned. This might well be the local peer. If the file is owned by no one, then it will go to the local peer, where it would be created.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file
Returns:
the owner peer. Null if no current owner;

sendMessage

public void sendMessage(java.util.Map message)
Send out a message

Parameters:
message - the message to send out
